arabic.title: آسف جدًا
text: آسف إني غصبن عني كنت كتير على حبك باقي
كنت فنارك وطنك دارك، كنت فليل الغربة مدينتك
كل جرح ناره قايده، كان خطأ مني أنا
لو حلوم حد النهار ده، مش حلوم غيري أنا
عيون خاينين، أحضان سكاكين، راجع شارب منهم حزن
آسف إني، إني فيوم قربتك مني
كان إحساسي فبعدك عني، ظلمه وعتمه ورعب و خوف
بيني وبين الناس التانيه حاجز عاجز فاقد الشوق
آسف إني غصبن عني كنت كتير عن حبك باقي
كنت فنارك وطنك دارك كنت فليل الغربة مدينتك
سبني أعيش فنهار، سبني أضيع وانهار
سبنى جايز أنسى مبارح وأنسى أحزاني أنا
أبقى مين أو إيه، أبقى حبيبك ليه؟!
ده انت عايز قلب جارح، قلب غير قلبي أنا
انا لو آسف، بتاسفلك لو في حياتك كنت واقفلك
كنت كتير عمال بحلفلك إني هعيش العمر معاك

english.title: So Sorry
text: I'm sorry, for the abundance of my emotions
I'm sorry, that against my reason i held so tightly to your love
I'm sorry, if i entrusted you with my life
I'm sorry, i didn't hurt and betray you
In your worst times i was your home, In your dark nights i was your refuge
The one who once loved you, was me
The one who was deceived, was me
Every fiery wound of mine, it was my own fault
The one who was tricked, was me
The one with the tragic end, is me
If i was to blame someone today, I'll blame no one by myself
Keep moving forward without a care in the world
faithless eyes, sharp arms, caused me nothing but pain
I'm sorry i let you get so close to me
All i felt when you went away was, darkness, terror, and fear
I lived every second for you
I felt that you were my whole world
Now between me and others, there's a giant cold wall
I'm sorry for the abundance of my emotions
I'm sorry that against my reason i held so tightly to your love
I'm sorry if i entrusted you with my life
I'm sorry i didn't hurt and betray you
In your worst times i was your home, In your dark nights i was your refuge
Leave me by myself, let me get lost and collapse
Let me go, so may i forget yesterday, so may i forget my pain
What and who am i ?! why am i your lover !?
You deserve a cold blooded heart, other than this heart of mine
All of your words were nothing but false illusions
Such a lying and deceitful human
What do you know about love ?
If I'm sorry, I'm sorry that i stood by you
I swore that I'll live forever by your side
My heart couldn't bear seeing the fragility of you
I believed all of your tears

arabic.title: أنا قلت
text: انا قلت ان انت صفحة من حياتى قلبتها
ايام بلعنها كل م بفتكر يوم منها
وانا هنسى فى يوم ما جيتلك
ده انا كنت فى عز ضعفى

english.title: I Said
text: I said you're a page in my life that I've turned
I curse those days when I remember them
I regret those days, I wish I never lived them
I will always scream out loud, I hate you
All between me and you, is now over
Don't ever think that i'll come back and forgive you
You are the one who taught me to be ruthless
You were cruel to me like no other
Yes, I've learnt from you. Yes, thank you
Don't ever think those days will come back
My memories of you hurt me
Whatever tears, whatever crying, it's all over between us
For years now and I am not showing any tears. I wiped them all
Now you are coming back to me, regretting that you've left me
Taste and try some of the bitterness and pain you caused me before. Feel it.
Previously, I always said that i'll bear this because you are my love
Everytime you push me away, I feel the nostalgia
Crazy one who says I missed you
I remember none of our memories. I forgot them all
I regret the seconds, the minutes, the hours
This(my love with you) was a big mistake, and now I've learnt from it
Will I forget the day when I came to you and you said I refuse your love?
I was so weak, and you treated treated me with tyranny
if I am truly your lover, tell me, what is stopping you?

english.title: How are you my love
text: you are far away from me
oh you're like my life that got away from me
I don't hear your voice, why?(you don't speak to me)
we said that no matter how time separates us
we said that no matter how time separates us
remember me and don't forget me
we said that no matter how time separates us
we said that no matter how time separates us
remember me and don't forget me
even if you forget my eyes
and if you don't ask about me
i'll still ask about you, my dear
i need you so much now
i never forget you during the night
your lap, so much, so much
i wish those nights come back
i miss you you so so much
it passes like it were years
the feeling of longing screams in my heart
even if you forget my eyes
and if you don't ask about me
i'll still ask about you, my dear
even if you forget my eyes
and if you don't ask about me
i'll still ask about you, my dear

arabic.title: حدوس على قلبى
text: انا اللى اخترت اعيش بيكي اكون ليكي
لا ناس ولا دنيا ولا عنك زمن حاشنى
انا اللى بأيدى دلوقتى هدوس على كل شئ بنا
هادوس على قلبى لو قالى بتوحشنى
ههدك زى ما بنيك هسيبك زى مالقيتك بلا اهادف
تراب ع الارض كان مرمى ولا يتشاف
ولا طايلة حياة ولا موت وبتنادى بعلو الصوت
ولا حضعف ولا حسمع ولا هبكى ولا هدمع
ولا هتلاقى يوم انسان يداوى الجرح والكسرة
مافيش غير قلب كان غلبان ومات مالحزن والحسرة
على عينى هاعيش ايامى وهلاقى لقلبى دواه
ولا موت فى بعادك عنى انا بعدك عنى حياه
انا قادر الم جروحى و ح ادوس على قلبى وروحى
انا قادر اهد الحلم اللى معاكى قلبى بناه
على عمرى اللى انا عيشته معاكى
انا اسف جدآ ليكى على كل طريق مشيناه
مانا اللى اخترت انا اللى اخترت انا اللى اخترت
انا اللى اخترت اعيش بيكي اكون ليكي
لا ناس ولا دنيا ولا عنك زمن حاشنى
انا اللى بأيدى دلوقتى هدوس على كل شئ بنا
هادوس على قلبى لو قالى بتوحشنى
ههدك زى ما بنيك هسيبك زى مالقيتك

english.title: I will step on my heart
text: I was the one that choose to be yours
No one or anything kept me away from you
I choose your days, and your days
I will end everything between us
I will destroy everything between us
I will step on my heart if it tells me that it misses you
I will destroy you just like how I made you
I will leave you just like how I found you
Dirt on the ground that no one saw
You don't know how to live or die
And you called with your loudest voice
I wont be week or listen
I wont cry or tear up
And you will never find someone
That will fix your wound and broken heart
There isnt but a poor heart
Forget about the past and future
My eyes will live the days
I will find the medicine for my heart
No more fire, wounds or harshness
They were days that don't count
I wont care about you being away
When your not here, I can live
I will step over my heart and my soul
I am able to destroy the dreams
That builded it with your heart
the days I spent with you
I am very sorry for you
For everything that we ever did
I was the one that choose

arabic.title: كانت أيام و عدت
text: كانت ايام وعدت كانت ايام وفاتت
كان ما بيننا حبة ذكريات وماتت
كان لك معايا ساعات واوقات وحاجات بندم عليها
كان لك معايا احلام اوهام ايام الله يجازيها
شوفنا ايه حلو في حياتنا ليله
الف جرح في قلبي منك كفايا بقي
كان لك معايا ساعات اوقات حاجات بندم عليها
كان لك معايا احلام اوهام ايام الله يجازيها
ما لكش في حياتي وجود حنين واشتياق مرفوض صدقني انا
مات القلب الطيب مات الحب بايدك
فات الوقت وكل دموعك مش هتفيدك
دموع انسي رجوع انسي خلاص انسي
اندم انت علي اللي فاتنا ليله ابكي تاني وقول ياريتنا ليله
هتلاقيني بعدت عنك الف جرح في قلبي منك كفايا بقي
كان لك معايا ساعات اوقات حاجات بندم عليها
كان لك معايا احلام اوهام ايام الله يجازيها

english.title: Those days are gone
text: Those days are gone, they were days that just passed by
all we had was a bit of memories and they're gone now
we had hours, times and things that I regret
we had dreams and illusions that I wish I never had
you go back to our memories, one night
remember everything we've missed, one night
get me the day when our sighs went cold, one night
what good have we seen in our lives?
you'll find me away from you
there's a thousand wound in my heart from you, enough already!
we had hours, times and things that I regret
we had dreams and illusions that I wish I never had
my pain, my years of suffering
who's your lover? I'm sure it's not me
you have no existence in my life, longing for you is forbidden, believe me
the good heart had died, the love died in your hands
it's too late, all your tears won't do it for you
tears, forget about coming back, forget, won't you forget already!
you, regret what we've missed one night, cry again and wish that we were just one night
you'll find me away from you, there's a thousand wound in my heart from you, enough already!
we had hours, times and things that I regret
we had dreams and illusions that I wish I never had

arabic.title: كل سنه وانت خاين
text: انت غرامك أسوأ ذكرى عاشت فيا
انا أتمنى الموت ولا انك ترجع ليا
أنا والله لازم تندم اوي عليا

english.title: Kull sana wenta khayyin
text: I wish you to be a betrayer every year , exactly like you are
You live and love again ,and hurt my heart again
You'll keep always perfidious and selfish
and painful , exactly like you are
So that I won't be the end , So that I won't be the last story
and that the victims you hurt will increase
Every time the sound of the sea reminds my eye of your face
I regret , then , I take back and I thank my god that I lost you
The hurt's fire made me hate your biography (talking about you)
Your speech , your greetings , your tenderness , and your jealousy
It was , all , lies and deception , it was all illusion and loss , it was a dream its end is Good-bye
You didn't care about my year's torment , You didn't even care about my dieing Longing , it was an illusion between me and you
Of course , I must give a present , of course
Of course , I must , after the greetings , Listen to the simplest gift I sang for you
Your passion is the worst memory that lived inside me
you are sick , born with hurting and egoism (selfishness)
I wish death than you come back to me
I swear , you have to remorse for me
I'll resist and I'll heal my illness
I'm hating the time we met
I'll kill he years of our love
I let you play your role
I sold my lifetime in your seas
I left you , and accepted your self-conceit
I let you play with me
I'm like you , a partner, and injurious
your teachery was free and wilful
I'm like you , I wronged myself
I betrayed my hope and my ambition
And now I'm paying my hurt's price

arabic.title: ليلة ورا ليلة
text: كل حته فيه بتحبك يا حبيبى
دانا بحب كل حاجة قربتني ليك
انا بحب كل حاجة  تلمسها بايديك
اسال عينيك انا قد ايه بحبك
دانت بقيت ساكن يا عمرى كل دقه
حبيبى لا لا لا لا لا حبيبى ايه

english.title: Laila
text: night after night,you're on my mind
i swear of god i don't forget one of the nights
every night and day i love you my beloved
everyday my eyes miss you my beloved
everyday my hands need you my beloved
every ounce of me loves you my beloved
oh how i sufeer,if i satay at night saying
how i'm occupied thinking about you
days and night have passed by ,charged me with yearning
your love called me and the wishes got me up high
i'm clost to love you ,a love that hasn't been even created
my beloved,no no,you're not my beloved
cause you're the beloved off all liftime ,of all the life
i'm lying to you if i say that i love you
ask those eyes of your,i love you
night after night,you're on my mind
i swear of god i don't forget one of the nights
every night and day i love you my beloved
night after night,you're on my mind
i swear of god i don't forget one of the nights
every night and day i love you my beloved
every night and day i love you my beloved
everyday my eyes miss you my beloved
everyday my hands need you my beloved
every ounce of me loves you my beloved
oh how i suffer!my eyes on you you,my soul is in you
i wish you want me as half as i want you
no no matter how much you swear ,still no
i don't forget you eithr i'm with or without you
my lofe is yours from the begining till the end
you live in every beat of my heart
دانت الحياه دانت الامل اللى بعيش عليه
i'm lying to you if i say that i love you
ask those eyes of your,i love you
night after night,you're on my mind
i swear of god i don't forget one of the nights
every night and day i love you my beloved

arabic.title: والنعمة دى
text: C'est toi la vie, toi mon cheri
أنا ليك لا دا ولا دا

english.title: Wel ne3ma di
text: I confess to you my love
Come close to be stay near to me
I love you as I love the life
I love you as I love my life and and my soul ..no I love you more than that
I swear I love you as I love the life
My happiest moment in my life is when you’re with me
C'est toi la vie, toi mon cheri
You the vision of my eyes
İ wish seriously that we stay..and our hands stay together
İ’m yours neither this nor that
My life was started by you
Wa ana ......... 3layia (i’m sorry in fact i couldn’t understand this)
Away from you, i’ll be lost in this life
İ’m ready to give up my life but never leave you
I’m with my heart have forgotten my life before you
İ’m with my heart have forgetten our wounds as soon as we met
